course_description: Students will conduct analysis using Microsoft Excel to support marketing decisions. Topics addressed include segmentation and targeting, pricing, customer retention, marketing ROI, and demand forecasting. Students receive hands-on faculty guidance in creating marketing models, analyzing data, and extracting insights. A focus of the course will be on the development of decision support tools.
